metadata.job_title: Sr. Data Engineer(hands on Palantir exp.)

seniority_level.evidence: Title includes 'Sr.' and requires 8-10 years of Data Engineering experience

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and core focus is on data pipelines/solutions

sub_specialty.evidence: Palantir Foundry is a data lakehouse platform, and Hadoop-based technologies (Hive, PySpark) align with lakehouse patterns

leadership_expectation.evidence: Role requires hands-on experience with design and implementation of scalable data solutions, suggesting technical leadership without direct people management

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud providers explicitly mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 results

processing_paradigm.evidence: Hadoop-based technologies (Hive, PySpark) are primarily batch-focused, no streaming tools mentioned

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 results

storage_layer.evidence: Palantir Foundry is a data lakehouse platform, and Hadoop-based technologies suggest a mixed storage pattern

remote_restriction.evidence: Job posting states 'Looking for locals only for onsite' and specifies Atlanta, GA as the location

timezone_focus.evidence: Location is restricted to Atlanta, GA, implying a focus within the US

relocation_required.evidence: 'Looking for locals only' suggests relocation is not required or supported

h1b_friendly.evidence: Pass 1 states 'not_mentioned' for visa sponsorship, and 'locals only' implies no visa support

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: 'Looking for locals only' and 'independent candidate' suggests no OPT/CPT support

citizenship_required.evidence: 'Looking for locals only' implies work authorization is required but no explicit citizenship restriction

w2_vs_1099.evidence: No contract type or employment details mentioned beyond 'onsite' and 'independent candidate'

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits discussed in the job posting or Pass 1 results

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No discussion of career growth paths or tracks in the job posting

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship or coaching signals in the job posting or Pass 1 results

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion paths or advancement in the job posting

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal mobility or role changes in the job posting

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks discussed in the job posting

requirement_strictness.evidence: All skills listed are 'must_have_hard_skills' with no 'nice_to_have' skills, and strict experience range (8-10 years)

scope_definition.evidence: Job posting focuses on a single role with well-defined responsibilities (Palantir Foundry, Hadoop, Hive, PySpark)

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 8-10 years of experience aligns with senior-level expectations for Data Engineering roles
